feature1.explanation: Both texts use quotation marks for direct speech.

feature2.explanation: Text 1 uses more formal and structured language, while Text 2 has informal and colloquial language with slang.

feature3.explanation: Text 1 has longer and more complex sentences compared to Text 2.

feature4.explanation: Text 1 maintains a more formal and serious tone, while Text 2 has a sarcastic and mocking tone.

feature5.explanation: No significant spelling or typographical errors in either text.

overall.explanation: Considering the differences in language formality, sentence complexity, and tone, the likelihood of the two texts being written by the same author is low to moderate.
